To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Performance of Chime Bells, written by Elton Britt and Bob Miller, and performed by George Morgan. Performance of Careless Darling, written by Ernest Tubb, Bob Shelton, and Lou Wayne, and performed by an unidentified male voice with guitar accompaniment.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
